thread.title: Rising Freight Costs Are Weighing on Companies’ Profits

author: Austen Hufford
title: Rising Freight Costs Are Weighing on Companies’ Profits
text:
A number of U.S. companies told investors that rising shipping costs in recent months have cut into earnings.
The Wall Street Journal reported in January that shippers are postponing deliveries or being forced to accept higher prices due to a nationwide truck shortage.
Increased demand, from retailers looking to restock after the holidays... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
